Description._:

Some northbound [Q] trains are stopping along the [N] line from Coney Island-Stillwell Av to DeKalb Av.

These service changes are because of signal problems at Parkside Av.

Some northbound [Q] trains are stopping along the [N] line from Coney Island-Stillwell Av to DeKalb Av.

Summary._: [2], [3], [4] and [5] trains are running with delays in both directions because of a person struck by a train at Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.

Description._:

Some southbound [2] and [3] trains are stopping along the [1] line from Chambers St to South Ferry then end.

Southbound [4] and [5] trains end at Bowling Green or Brooklyn Bridge-City Hall.

These service changes are because of a person struck by a train at Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.

[A] [C] and [E] trains are bypassing 42 St/Port Authority-Bus Terminal in both directions.

There is no [S] 42 St shuttle service in both directions.

No [L] train service between 8 Av and 6 Av in both directions.

These service changes are because of an NYPD investigation at 42 St/Port Authority-Bus Terminal.
